mods.abstract: Guide K.M. Topous at Gizeh; elaborately dressed guide K.M. Topous sits atop a camel as his servant sits on a stone outcropping of the Great Sphinx (foreground); Pyramid of Khufu (background); "K.M. Topous Speaks several languages c/o address P.O. Box. No. 9 Cairo" in white at bottom right corner.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt
